amendatorysection.chaptername: State Uni., State Colleges, and Post. Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Out-of-state institution of higher education, defined.
amendatorysection.para: For purposes of sections 85-1102 to 85-1104, unless the context otherwise requires, out-of-state institution of higher education shall include any college, university, community college, technical institute, junior college, or the equivalent that offers college credit courses or awards an associate or higher degree and is controlled by a public or private body organized outside the boundaries of the State of Nebraska.
